name: Archon's Fall
description:
Archon's Fall is a single player, first person shooter set in multiple historical eras.  Play as Alep, a slave from the future that seeks revenge that has been laid upon him by going back in time to retrieve Medallions that has been used for power all throughout the ages. 

The game is filled with interesting environments that 

Utilize unique and fun abilities that you gain through RNG to defeat enemies and get through the beautiful and interesting environments that has been bought to you by our amazing team.

Meet and defeat our fascinating yet intimidating enemies to proceed with your adventuring. Use your gun to fight safely from a distance or your sword to get up and close to your foes and strike them down!

Solve puzzles that leads to the next area. Brute force your way or find the proper way in, either way works!

The game is constantly being worked on and being updated. We have planned tons for the future, so look forward to it! Some of it includes: 

  • Three new eras that introduces new enemies, new environments, new puzzles and more.
  • More abilities to further enhance your game play.
  • Dive deeper into the story as we progress more and more with each new era.

Stay update with us by following us on our socials, be it Twitter, Instagram or Tiktok! We will be working hard to give you the best gaming experience with our game. Also, please don't forget to leave us a feedback so we could further improve our game!

by
